item.title: About
item.description: Hey everyone, welcome to my website. My name is Trevor Idayaa Kevin Xavier and I was born in Dubai on March 27th 1998. I did my undergrad in Aerospace Engineering at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University with a concentration in Aeronautics. Currently I am a masters student majoring in Operations Research and Information Engineering with a concentration in Applied Operations Research. This website provides access to my resume and past projects that I have worked on.
